# Onboarding Checklist: <Name>

## Week 0 (Pre-start)

- [ ] Accounts created
- [ ] Access provisioned
- [ ] Intro calendar sent

## Week 1

- [ ] Repo access verified
- [ ] Start-here and handbook reviewed
- [ ] Meet team and role expectations

## Week 2-4

- [ ] First scoped deliverable shipped
- [ ] Process/tooling questions resolved
- [ ] Onboarding feedback collected
